comment.body:
Hi, you might need to add these files to "List of filtered applications" in AG windows app settings:

- `MuMuNxMain.exe`
- `MuMuNxDevice.exe`
- `MuMuVMMHeadless.exe`

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/222366#issuecomment-3738857440 I can't reproduce the blank page. Please try updating AG to newer version `5.2.800.27` and test again.

I can only see there are popups. I'll address this.
